mapper.insert: INSERT INTO members( mem_id, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_name, mem_profile, mem_address, mem_level ) VALUES ( #{memId}, #{memPw}, #{memEmail}, #{memPhone}, #{memName}, #{memProfile}, #{memAddress}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT mem_id, mem_pw, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_name, mem_profile, mem_address, mem_level FROM members WHERE 1=1 AND MEM_ID = #{memId} AND MEM_PW = #{memPw}
mapper.update: UPDATE members SET mem_pw = #{memPw}, mem_email = #{memEmail}, mem_phone = #{memPhone}, mem_name = #{memName}, mem_address = #{memAddress}, mem_profile = #{memProfile} WHERE 1=1 AND mem_id = #{memId}
